name: Love Love School Days
summary:
Brain Link, a next-generation device that synchronizes brain waves and allows users to enter the world of games, was released, and games compatible with it were released one after another.

The love simulation game "Love School Days" has also announced its compatibility with this device.

Finally, humans can enter the world of romantic simulation games.

In addition, the heroine of this game is equipped with AI and can think for herself.

The protagonist synchronizes his brain waves with the game to conquer the game, but he is unable to make the main heroine his girlfriend.

As a compromise, he decides to make the sub-character "Sakurazaki Makina" his girlfriend.

The two made love forever in the game, but the hero couldn't make the main heroine his girlfriend.

However, the hero tries to start the game from the beginning to challenge the main heroine again.

However, the hero is sent back to the game world after clearing the game by "Sakurazaki Machina" who modified the data in the game by self-learning.

Will the hero be able to return to the real world again?
